data.question: What is the Schläfli symbol for the first uniform net containing only planar four-coordinate nodes?
At what temperature does α-Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2 form?
What is the yield percentage of α-Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2 when synthesized?
Is the (8,4) network topology self-penetrating?
Does the β-Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2 structure contain 1D chains?
Is the reaction temperature a factor in determining the polymorph formed in the synthesis of Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2?
What is the yield of β-Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2 when synthesized at 150 °C?
What type of ligands bridge the metal centers in the structure of β-Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2?
Are the Ni atoms in α-Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2 coordinated in a planar fashion?
Does the structure of α-Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2 contain hydrogen bonds?
What is the role of NaOH in the synthesis of α-Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2?
data.answer: It is used in the hydrothermal reaction process.

data.question: How does the structure of α-Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2 differ from β-Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2?
data.answer: α-Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2 has a 3D polymeric structure, while β-Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2 consists of 1D chains.

data.question: Can the (8,4) network topology be realized as a four-coordinated sphere packing?
What is the maximum symmetry of the underlying net of the (8,4) network?
Are there two different node-node distances in the (8,4) network topology?
What is the significance of the hydrothermal reaction temperature in the synthesis of Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2 polymorphs?
data.answer: It determines which polymorph is formed.

data.question: What is the coordination geometry of Ni atoms in α-Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2?
How are the chains in the structure of β-Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2 interconnected?
Is the (8,4) network the first to contain only planar four-coordinate nodes?
What is the role of hydrogen bonds in the structure of α-Ni(pyara)2(H2O)2?
data.answer: They may play an important role in directing the network topology.
